faqIntro: Find answers to the most frequently asked questions about the app here.
privacySettingsSaved: Your privacy settings have been saved.
deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action is irreversible.
passwordLengthError: Password must be at least 6 characters.
missingFields: Please fill in all required fields.
faqSearchPropertyQ: How can I search for a property?
faqSearchPropertyA: Tap on the Search tab and enter your criteria, such as location, price, or property type. Results will update as you change filters.
faqSavePropertyQ: How do I save a property I like?
faqSavePropertyA: When viewing a property, tap the heart icon to add it to your favorites list. You can view all your saved properties in your account.
faqContactAgentQ: How do I contact a real estate agent?
faqContactAgentA: On each property page, you'll find a 'Contact Agent' button. Tap it to send a message or call the agent directly.
faqListPropertyQ: Can I list my property for sale or rent on Soudou?
faqListPropertyA: Yes! Go to your account and tap 'List a Property' to get started. Follow the steps to provide details, photos, and your contact information.
faqChangeAccountQ: How do I edit my account information?
faqChangeAccountA: Go to Account > Edit Profile to update your name, email address, or other info. Use the Settings menu to change your phone or password.
faqForgotPasswordQ: What if I forgot my password?
faqForgotPasswordA: On the login screen, tap 'Forgot Password?' and follow the instructions to reset your password by email or SMS.
termsOfUseText:
Welcome to our app! By using this app, you agree to the following terms:

1. You will use the app only for legal purposes.
2. You will not attempt to harm, hack, or abuse the app or its users.
3. All content and features are provided as is, without any warranty.

For more details, contact support.
privacyPolicyText:
Your privacy is important to us.

- We only collect information necessary to provide our services.
- We do not sell your data.
- For any questions about your data usage, please contact support.

See our full privacy policy on our website.
